snippet: Politicians had raised concerns that Mr. Newman, president of Operation Rescue, might encourage violence against abortion providers or women seeking the procedure.
abstract: Troy Newman, head of American anti-abortion group Operation Rescue, is expected to be deported by Australian authorities after trying to enter country without valid visa; Australian authorities rescinded his visa over concerns that he might incite violence against women seeking abortions or abortion providers.
lead_paragraph: Politicians had raised concerns that Mr. Newman, president of Operation Rescue, might encourage violence against abortion providers or women seeking the procedure.

headline.main: Australia Set to Deport Troy Newman, Head of U.S. Anti-Abortion Group
headline.print_headline: Head of U.S. Anti-Abortion Group Loses Deportation Appeal in Australia
